item.description: Hello! I'm running the Boston Marathon for Back on My Feet, a non-profit organization that works with Boston's homeless population. I'm having a fundraising party at The Pour House at 907 Boylston Street on Tuesday, March 20 from 6 pm to 9 pm; cover is $10. Join the party! If you can't join the party, but would like to donate to this kick ass cause, you can do so here: www.crowdrise.com/bomfbostonmarathon/fundraiser/lindsaysilverman Lindsay

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Marathon Fundraising Party
